description:
Kou Hiko runs away with the princes to Rintou Outpost, but is soon hunted down by three assassins. Kou Tenka, the son of Kou Hiko, makes his appearance.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Fine Fellow Appears at Rintou Outpost
Auf dem Weg in neue Welten
Un dur à cuire au barrage Lintow
臨潼関に快男児あらわる
